## Data source

```{r}
# Loading data and packages:
library(tidyverse)
library(naniar)

spotify_data_1million <- 
  read_csv("data/spotify_data.csv")

spotify_data_top_streams <- 
  read_csv("data/ATop 1990-2022.csv")
```

The first data source that I chose to use for this final project is the dataset that collected about 1 Million tracks with 19 features between the years 2000 and 2023. ^[this data was taken from kaggle](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/amitanshjoshi/spotify-1million-tracks)

The second data source that I chose to use is "Spotify Top Tracks 1990-2022", which features of all the "Top Hits xxxx"- and "Top Tracks xxxx"-playlists from 1990-2022. ^[this data was taken from kaggle](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/ztofff/top-1990-2022)
